resources.string: Do you want to reduce your carbon footprint? We will help you with it!
Your cars` carbon footprint with \ntrustful data from ADAC.
We will show you your emissions compared to the average.\nYou can choose individually how much you would like to reduce.
If you achieve your personal goal you \ncan coose between attractive \neco-friendly rewards.
In order to calculate your carbon footprint, we need to know which car you drive.
How many kilometers do you \naproximately drive per year?
